ModMetaData.name: Rimhammer - Steam Tank
ModMetaData.author: SickBoyWi
ModMetaData.description:
This mod makes use of the most epic Philâ€™s Vehicles framework./n/nThe purpose of this mod is to add themed vehicles to accompany the Rimhammer - The End Times mod set, although the Rimhammer mods are not required for this mod.
This adds a medieval / steam punk / Warhammer Fantasy style series of Steam Tanks to the game.
There are a handful of different variants of the steam tank, each with its own specialization. There are also components that can be claimed from destroyed steam tanks, or crafted on your own.
The steam tanks are stylized as they were for the Warhammer world, and therefore the patterns and colors that come with the vehilce framework will not be utilized.
